entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
